description:
Variation of the same multi-technology project that I develop in several stacks to demonstrate my versatility.
This version uses Laravel for the API and Vue.js for the dynamic interface.
The application allows browsing, filtering and managing a movie & series catalog, with MySQL integration and performance optimizations.
longDescription:
This project is part of a set of applications that I intentionally build using different front-end and back-end technologies. The goal is to showcase my ability to switch environments quickly, master several stacks, and demonstrate my motivation to improve continuously.

This web application manages a movie and TV show catalog, enriched through the TVDB API and connected to a MySQL database.
The user can search for a movie or series, view the retrieved information, and add it directly to the catalog.

Once added, each item includes a fully detailed page with:

  • title,
  • description,
  • genres,
  • artworks / posters,
  • cast,
  • studios,
  • production crew,
  • seasons and episodes for TV shows.

The platform also includes a user area where someone can:

  • create an account / log in,
  • like or dislike movies or series,
  • add titles to a watchlist,
  • find followed or favorite content.

This version highlights the capabilities of Laravel and VueJS, including API management, MySQL integration, complex data handling, and a smooth user experience.

This project is part of a set of applications developed using different front-end and back-end environments. The goal is to highlight my ability to quickly adapt, master modern stacks, and stay motivated to continually improve.

Like the other variants, it manages a movie & TV show catalog connected to a MySQL database and enriched via the TVDB API.

Each added item includes a detailed page with:

  • title,
  • description,
  • genres,
  • artworks / posters,
  • cast,
  • studios,
  • production crew,
  • seasons and episodes for TV shows.

The user area allows:

  • account creation / login,
  • liking / disliking items,
  • managing a watchlist,
  • retrieving favorites and followed series.

This version showcases the strengths of Symfony (clean architecture, security, performance) combined with Vue.js for a modern, reactive and fast interface.

The user area allows:
